price: 100. Nafna ma rumeyso Idanka Alle la'aantii, Wuxuuna Alle yeelaa qurunka24 kuwaa dushooda aan (Xaqa) garowsan.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: 24. Waxaa ka mid ah macnooyinkeeda wasakh, cadho, ciqaab, gaalnimo, qas, fowdo, iyo habow.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayajʿalu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
